description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军上将，原副国级领导人。曾任中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、国防部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a general in the People's Liberation Army, and a former leader of Vice-National level. He served as a member of the Central Military Commission of the CPC and the PRC, and as the Minister of National Defense.
